{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine the maximum risk of ureter injury, we need to analyze the relevant documents for information on the incidence and causes of ureteral injuries during different surgical procedures. Document [9] states that the incidence of bladder and ureter injury during abdominal hysterectomy is 0.58% and 0.35% respectively. Document [11] mentions that gynecological laparoscopic procedures account for more than half of the ureter injuries. Document [14] also states that gynecological laparoscopic procedures are the most common cause of ureteric injuries. Based on this information, the maximum risk of ureter injury is seen after laparoscopic abdominal hysterectomy (Choice C).", "answer_choice": "C"}
